High Priest Orven:

I think there are still too many monsters.

Go to the War-Torn Plains and defeat the monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Graveyard Wanderer, Archer of Greed, Hatar Ratman Thief, Hatar Ratman Boss, Hatar Hanishee, Deprive, Taik Orc Elder, Violent Farcran.

You have to kill 700 monsters.
Come back after dealing with monsters.
